text: megadeli irisu le’inanite yetet’ela sihoni be’inanite layi tets’afe፡፡ anidachi negerini irisu lenanite yebelet’e sihoni yemitit’eluti mehonachihu teregaget’e፡፡ anidachinimi negeri irisu lenanite met’ifo sihoni yemitiweduti mehonachihu teregaget’e፡፡ alahimi (yemishalachihuni) yawik’ali gini inanite atawik’umi፡፡
